summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for various packages sent by NYSO LLC. It includes information about the billing account, shipping addresses, and specific charges related to the services provided. The invoice also outlines changes in FedEx policies regarding invoice adjustments effective April 1, 2001.

persons.name: Bella Tsukeman
persons.context: Bella Tsukeman is listed as the billing contact for NYSI3 LLC on the invoice.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Lauren Kwintner is mentioned as the sender for several packages listed in the invoice.

persons.name: Marc Lundberg
persons.context: Marc Lundberg is mentioned as the sender for one of the packages listed in the invoice.

persons.name: Jeff Schantz
persons.context: Jeff Schantz is mentioned as the recipient for one of the packages sent via FedEx.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice detailing shipping charges for various packages sent by NYSO LLC.

events.title: Policy Change
events.description: FedEx announced a change in policy regarding invoice adjustments effective April 1, 2001.

locations: 6525 West Campus Oval, New Albany, OH 43054
keyFacts: The invoice number is 5-788-48681 and the invoice date is March 30, 2001.
Bella Tsukeman is the billing contact for NYSI3 LLC.
Lauren Kwintner is mentioned multiple times as a sender for packages.
FedEx is implementing a new policy for invoice adjustments effective April 1, 2001.
The total amount due on the invoice is USD 75.52.
